jobs.title: Nurse Manager - Home Infusion Pharmacy
jobs.shortDescription: Lead our Home Infusion Pharmacy team with clinical expertise and compassionate leadership.
jobs.fullDescription:
We are seeking an experienced and compassionate Nurse Manager to lead our Home Infusion Pharmacy team. This individual will oversee clinical operations, ensure high-quality patient care, and support a collaborative work environment for nursing and pharmacy staff serving patients in their homes.

You will play a key role in coordinating interdisciplinary care, managing staff performance, maintaining compliance with healthcare regulations, and helping improve patient outcomes through innovation and leadership.
responsibilities: Oversee daily operations of the Home Infusion Department
Supervise and mentor nursing and pharmacy staff
Coordinate interdisciplinary care for patients receiving home infusion therapy
Ensure compliance with quality standards, safety protocols, and documentation requirements
Develop and implement departmental policies, procedures, and performance goals
Monitor staffing levels and productivity standards
Support staff development and training initiatives
qualifications: Active RN license in Washington State (Oregon license preferred)
Bachelor's degree in Nursing or related healthcare field (or equivalent experience)
4+ years of home infusion or home health nursing experience
2+ years in a supervisory or nurse management role
Strong leadership, communication, and organizational skills
benefits: Comprehensive medical, dental, and vision coverage
Paid time off (vacation, holidays, sick days)
Tuition reimbursement and professional development support
Employee wellness and family care programs
jobs.aboutCompany: Our organization provides high-quality, compassionate care across multiple states through home health, hospice, infusion therapy, and community care programs. We are committed to creating an inclusive, supportive environment for both our patients and our team members.
